{{book: '''''Tyalië Tyelelliéva'' 9''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Tyalië Tyelelliéva]]''.
*Celeg Aithorn by Lisa Star (news from the Internet)
*Letters to the Editor from Dr. Rhona Beare (on mythological geography), Edouard Kloczko (on review of his book), Nancy Martsch (on intensives)

*Painted Caves and Yggdrasil, by Dr. [[Rhona Beare]] (article on sources for Tolkien's Father Christmas Letters art; enclosed with this issue - until they run out - is a postcard with Tolkien's cave painting on it)
*Three Kinds of Elves by Leonid Korablev (article on the historical origins of elf folk lore with calligraphy)
*Four Calligraphic Styles of Tengwar by Leonid Korablev (calligraphy)
*Ilkorin and North Sindarin by [[Édouard Kloczko]] (article on phonological analysis of early dialects)
*Inspired by Art: William Morris, by Lisa Star (article on [[William Morris
*Catamando Lire Mincarme by David Salo (translation of Caedmon's Hymn with calligraphy and explanation)
**Tengwar Fonts designed by Dan Smith (software review)
